name: AVI-GetPersistenceProfile
description: Get the list of persistence profiles
transformation:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
 <xsl:template match="/">
 <root>
 <xsl:for-each select="root/results/result">
 <xsl:sort select="name" />
 <results>
          <data><xsl:value-of select="name"/></data>
          <label><xsl:value-of select="name"/></label>
 </results>
 </xsl:for-each>
 </root>
 </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
